column4: I am going nuts I have been tryin to get the hp express tuner card work (rebranded hvr 1500) but for some reason it says fails to load firmware ( i2c-adapter i2c-1: firmware: requesting dvb-fe-xc5000-1.1.fw , xc5000: Upload failed. (file not found?)
xc5000: Unable to initialise tuner) but I can't find it anywhere
